text: Let's enjoy this English language learning community.
Sit back, relax, and watch all of the videos that you guys made about learning English.
Two weeks ago, I asked you all to make a video in English
talking about how you first started studying English.
Wow! You guys are so wonderful. So dedicated.
Everyone went from not knowing a thing about English
to being able to make a video in English talking about learning English.
It is so fun learning more about you, your language journeys, and your lives.
How and where did people in this community first study English?
But first, quickly, if you didn't know about this challenge and you want to participate in the next one,
be sure to sign up for my mailing list.
You'll get an email every week with the latest news on what's happening
in this English language learning community.
